h1_title: How to Find the Five Skandhas and Unlock a Secret Boss
h2_title: How to Find the Skandha of Choice
content: Hug the wall on the right as you follow the path up to the next set of stairs and a wooden bridge. Cross the wooden bridge, and follow the path as it curves around to the left.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Find_the_Five_Skandhas_and_Unlock_a_Secret_Boss.md', within the main section titled 'How to Find the Five Skandhas and Unlock a Secret Boss', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Skandha of Choice'.
The content is as follows:
Hug the wall on the right as you follow the path up to the next set of stairs and a wooden bridge. Cross the wooden bridge, and follow the path as it curves around to the left.
